title: Exposure of Mock Data in Production
description: The logic in `app/api/flights/route.ts` was implemented correctly for the integration, but the UI is currently hitting `/api/flights` which proxies to Amadeus. However, the store fallback to MOCK_FLIGHTS was removed. This is GOOD for production, but we should make sure error handling doesn't purely crash.

title: Date Handling in Search
description: Amadeus requires YYYY-MM-DD. We added date-fns formatting in the API route. Ensure Client sends ISO or similar valid Date string.
